mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`AUTHID`, t1.`CREDENTIAL`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IDENTITY_TYPE`, t1.`USERID`, t11.`USERNAME` FROM `IBZUSERAUTH` t1 LEFT JOIN `IBZUSER` t11 ON t1.`USERID` = t11.`USERID` ) t1 where authid=#{id}
